definition: to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: Wolves and dogs can interbreed and produce offspring.
sentences.chinese: 狼和狗能夠異種交配而且繁育後代。

sentences.english: The pup looked to be a cross between a Lab and a German shepherd.
sentences.chinese: 看起來是拉布拉多獵犬和德國牧羊犬交配的品種。

sentences.english: Adult males are able to mate at any time.
sentences.chinese: 成年的公犬在任何時候都可以交配。

sentences.english: Male boas were available to the boa mother and she had previously given birth to other snake litters by mating with males.
sentences.chinese: 她有雄伴，之前也曾通過交配產下其它小蛇。

sentences.english: The discovery also reveals how male squid compete for female mating partners.
sentences.chinese: 這一發現也揭示了雄性烏賊如何爭奪交配伴侶的。

sentences.english: But mating also involves plenty of competition between the sexes.
sentences.chinese: 但交配同時還涉及兩性間激烈的競爭。

sentences.english: Assortative mating Sexual reproduction in which the pairing of male and female is not random.
sentences.chinese: 有性生殖中配對的雌雄雙方不足隨機交配的現象。

sentences.english: The mating type genes in B loci contain multiple pheromone and pheromone receptors.
sentences.chinese: 而B位點的交配型基因編碼信息素及其受體。

sentences.english: It begets at least seven standard type offspring from such matings.
sentences.chinese: 這類交配中生下至少七個標準型後代。

sentences.english: The copulation in mule market has become the common thing.
sentences.chinese: 騾馬市上的交配也就成了情理之事。

sentences.english: the gossiper mates with the man herself.
sentences.chinese: 散佈謠言的人自己就可以跟那個男人交配。

sentences.english: Yes, "I" have been using pheromones for mating butterfly intervention in the air.
sentences.chinese: 是的，蛾費洛蒙已經應用在空中進行交配干擾。

sentences.english: In other words, they can’t simply fertilize themselves.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說他們不能簡單地自己和自己交配。

sentences.english: Black widows are solitary year-round except during this violent mating ritual.
sentences.chinese: 黑寡婦除了這一兇暴的交配過程以外終年獨居。

sentences.english: Wolbachia's most common manipulation is to interfere in the success of the host's matings .
sentences.chinese: 沃巴赫菌最常用的手段是干擾宿主的交配結果。

definition: the breeding season (zool.)/oestrus (period of sexual receptivity of female mammals)
to give birth (animals)/to bear a litter
parthenogenesis (biol. a female reproducing without fertilization)
